interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Jillian Michaels Ripped in 30
Review Date: 2011/09/20
Store: Jillian Michaels  (Actor),     Andrea Ambandos  (Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Exercise & Fitness
Product Description: ["Get RIPPED with America's Toughest Trainer! Jillian Michaels new DVD Ripped in 30 is a comprehensive 30-day diet and exercise plan designed to get you in the best shape of your life! Ripped in 30 is comprised of four 24-minute workouts based on Jillian's best-selling body shredding 3-2-1 interval system: 3 minutes of strength, 2 minutes of cardio and 1 minute of abs. Each incredible routine has fresh, fun new moves that progress in difficulty over a four-week period (a new workout each week). You'll start with workout level 1 and advance to workout level 4. Jillian also shows modified moves for both beginners and advanced athletes in each workout. All you have to do to get sick, insane, crazy, amazing results fast is stick with the Ripped in 30 diet and exercise program for 30 days. Get ready to get RIPPED!"]
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Exercise & Fitness', 'Format': 'NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Jillian Michaels, Andrea Ambandos', 'Language': 'Unqualified (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo)', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 16 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 3.5 Ounces', 'Item model number': '05-58076', 'Director': 'Andrea Ambandos', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Run time': '2 hours and 16 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 9, 2012', 'Actors': 'Jillian Michaels', 'Studio': 'Gaiam - Fitness', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: This DVD is not for the faint of heart. It is quite challenging and you'll be pouring sweat after just a few minutes. I've made it through all four levels, though I've only done level 4 once. I'd say that level 1 done with 8lb handweights is the best overall workout on the DVD. If you're looking for an intense 30-min workout that hits all the right places, this is the one for you.
Review Title: Best Jillian workout yet!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Jillian Michaels Ripped in 30
Jillian Michaels  (Actor),     Andrea Ambandos  (Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Exercise & Fitness
["Get RIPPED with America's Toughest Trainer! Jillian Michaels new DVD Ripped in 30 is a comprehensive 30-day diet and exercise plan designed to get you in the best shape of your life! Ripped in 30 is comprised of four 24-minute workouts based on Jillian's best-selling body shredding 3-2-1 interval system: 3 minutes of strength, 2 minutes of cardio and 1 minute of abs. Each incredible routine has fresh, fun new moves that progress in difficulty over a four-week period (a new workout each week). You'll start with workout level 1 and advance to workout level 4. Jillian also shows modified moves for both beginners and advanced athletes in each workout. All you have to do to get sick, insane, crazy, amazing results fast is stick with the Ripped in 30 diet and exercise program for 30 days. Get ready to get RIPPED!"]

This DVD is not for the faint of heart. It is quite challenging and you'll be pouring sweat after just a few minutes. I've made it through all four levels, though I've only done level 4 once. I'd say that level 1 done with 8lb handweights is the best overall workout on the DVD. If you're looking for an intense 30-min workout that hits all the right places, this is the one for you.
Best Jillian workout yet!!!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Fitness Enthusiast**: The user shows a strong preference for intense exercise programs, specifically those that focus on both strength and cardio.
- **Challenge-Seeker**: They appreciate workouts that are demanding and provide significant results, indicating a willingness to endure tough training sessions.
- **Structured Programs**: The user favors comprehensive fitness plans that guide them through progressive levels, suggesting a preference for structured approaches to exercise.
- **Positive Reviews**: Their high rating of the product suggests satisfaction with its effectiveness and a likely tendency to rate well-designed and results-oriented fitness programs.
- **Equipment Use**: The mention of using weights in the workout implies a preference for incorporating resistance training into their fitness routine.
- **Commitment to Routine**: The user shows a commitment to completing full workout programs, indicating determination and discipline in their fitness journey.
- **Quick Workouts**: They seem to favor shorter, intense workouts that can be completed in a manageable timeframe, likely for convenience or to fit a busy lifestyle. 

Overall, the user demonstrates a serious commitment to fitness with a preference for challenging, effective, and structured workout programs.
